contents.text: Welcome to Cadre Talent, San Francisco’s leading recruiting firm specialized in building top tech teams.
If you are a company looking to hire elite technology professionals, press 1.
To discuss your team-building strategy with one of our recruitment experts, press 1.
Thank you for holding. Please stay on the line while we connect you with a recruitment expert.

navigationGoals: Discuss strategy for recruiting senior engineers on my team.
I run a veteran-owned startup and need to discuss a strategy for hiring experienced software engineers.
I need to strategize our hiring roadmap for scaling the cloud engineering team.
I need to speak with someone about planning a hire for my small business’s tech team.
I’m leading a small research project and need to discuss hiring software engineers.

contents.text: To receive updates on an existing search or account, press 2.
We appreciate your patience. One of our account managers will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Get the latest update on my current hiring search.
I’m checking in on the status of our ongoing search for a senior developer we’re recruiting.
I’d like a status report on our active search for a senior backend engineer.
I’d like an update on the candidates and progress for our current hiring account.
I’d like an update on our active search for a data analyst to join our lab team.

contents.text: If you are a tech professional seeking exciting new opportunities, press 2.
To explore our current job openings and career paths, press 1.
Thank you for waiting. You will be connected to a talent advisor momentarily.

navigationGoals: Browse current tech job openings that match my skills.
As an ex-military professional transitioning to tech, I want to explore current software engineering openings that fit my background.
I’m exploring your current full-stack developer openings.
I want to review the latest technology job openings you have available.
I want to explore entry-level data science roles that fit my physics background.

contents.text: To submit your resume for future consideration, press 2.
Please hold while we gather your details and prepare your candidate profile.

navigationGoals: Submit my resume for future tech positions.
I’d like to submit my resume and profile for consideration for future IT roles as I move into civilian tech work.
I want to submit my resume for future architect-level DevOps roles.
I’d like to submit my CV for future tech roles you might fill.
I’d like to submit my resume for future openings in computational physics internships.
